balance.description: The amount of ESDT tokens the address possesses.

identifier.description: The identifier field is composed of the `token` field and the `nonce` field, hex encoded.

isSmartContract.description: True if the address is a smart contract address.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the address balance was changed.

token.description: The token name of the token.

tokenNonce.description: The sequence number of the token. This field can be empty in the case of `FungibleESDT`.
